issue.title: [CF 725] Dogtags [opacity] always show true
issue.body:
version r685
test string
^1^T^SOnlyMine^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^S774 ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnnouncements ^SChannel^SSAY ^SText^S[Opacity] ^SEvent^SOnShow ^t^N2^T ^SType^SAnnouncements ^SChannel^SSAY ^SText^S[Opacity] ^SEvent^SOnHide ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N61210^S~`~| ^Sicon^^


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl | Imported from CurseForge issue #725 | Raw

comments.body:
Attachment Added: .PNG

.PNG


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

By the way, StaticFormats.lua don't have DT_DOC_LocType, so DT_DOC_LocType in game it's still show %s.


> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

[Icon("Interface\Buttons\WHITE8X8", size=12)]  used in text output.

[Opacity] and [IsShown] test string:

Quote:

^1^T^SType^Sconditionicon ^SEvents^T ^N1^T ^SType^SAnnouncements ^SChannel^SFRAME ^SLocation^S綜合 ^SIcon^STellMeWhen_Group2_Icon1 ^SText^SIcon`shown`:`Opacity`[Opacity(2,`1)]`,`IsShown`[IsShown(2,`1)] ^SEvent^SOnIconShow ^t^N2^T ^SType^SAnnouncements ^SChannel^SFRAME ^SLocation^S綜合 ^SIcon^STellMeWhen_Group2_Icon1 ^SText^SIcon`hidden`:`Opacity`[Opacity(2,`1)]`,`IsShown`[IsShown(2,`1)] ^SEvent^SOnIconHide ^t^Sn^N2 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N1^S[Opacity(2,`1)] ^N2^S[IsShown(2,`1)] ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N61210^S`| ^Sicon^^

Edited Dec 8, 2012

> Posted by CurseForge user lsjyzjl

• [Opacity]: Fixed
  • Invalid escape code in chat message: Error intended. WoW's chat channels (say, yell, raid, trade, general, etc.) don't allow embedded textures.
  • DT_DOC_LocType: Fixed

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
